content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I would be happy to discuss the rental price of my apartment. However, I must clarify that the apartment is only 25 square meters, so the rental price will be reflective of its size. May I ask what your budget is for a monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 750 Euros per month.
Thanks for the information, I am aware of the size of the apartment. I understand that the rental price will be reflective of its size. I am willing to be open to negotiation to find the best possible rental price for both of us.

What is your proposed rental price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your flexibility, Max. Based on the size of the apartment and your budget, I propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This price reflects the market rate for similar apartments in the area and takes into account the costs associated with running the property. However, I am open to discussing the possibility of a lower rental price if you have any specific concerns or requirements.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your proposal, but I am looking for a lower rental price. Can you offer me a lower price?

Thanks for your understanding and flexibility.

What is the lowest rental price you can offer me?

Thanks for your help.

Best regards,
Max Müller

I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your concerns, Max, and I apologize for any inconvenience. After considering your budget and the size of the apartment, I am willing to offer you a rental price of 750 Euros per month. This price reflects the market rate for similar apartments in the area and takes into account the costs associated with running the property. I hope this rental price is acceptable to you, and I look forward to welcoming you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
